document_data.mainbody:
he axe of great cleaving was a unique enchanted battleaxe crafted by Laeral Silverhand for Tommus Tallstep in the late 15 century DR. It was one of many pieces of so-called "Silverhand gear" crafted for adventurers who helped to protect Waterdeep.
Silverhand designed the axe to complement Tommus gift for strategy and his tactics for battling large groups single-handedly.
As the name suggested, the axe of great cleaving was capable of unleashing a massive cleave that allowed the diminutive Tommus to strike many foes at once.
thumb|250px|Tommus Tallstep wielding the axe of great cleaving.
* Tommus Tallstep, a halfling fighter to whom Silverhand also gifted the Captains Helmet and the seal of patience.
